backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, orders, and subscriptions with access control and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op migration function returning the state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app wiring providers and rendering all main sections and components.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Account panel with tabs for profile, orders, and subscriptions plus logout support.
frontend/src/components/account/ActiveSu: Displays the user's active subscriptions with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/account/OrderHis: Shows the user's order history with formatted timestamps and fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileC: Dialog prompting users to complete and save their profile before checkout.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileF: Form component for editing and saving a user's profile with fields for name, email, phone, and address.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginDialog: Dialog that triggers Internet Identity login and closes on success.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginRequir: Dialog prompting login before restricted actions, offering login and cancel options.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Slide-out cart panel showing items, allowing quantity changes, and handling checkout with auth and profile checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with contact details, branding, and a dynamic copyright note.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with menu, cart, login/account buttons, and supporting mobile sheets.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Mobil: Mobile side menu listing navigation links that close on selection and smooth-scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product display card with image, price, and an auth-gated add-to-cart action.
frontend/src/components/sections/Categor: Category grid linking to shop sections with smooth scrolling on click.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, tagline, and a button that scrolls to categories.
frontend/src/components/sections/ReadyTo: Section listing ready-to-cut products using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/sections/SaladSe: Renders a salad product card from the salads list and adds it to the cart with authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Displays subscription plans with options to add to cart or subscribe via WhatsApp, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vegetab: Shows a grid of vegetable products using ProductCard and includes a price disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Provides a floating WhatsApp chat button linking to a preset number.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product interface and exports a list of vegetable product entries with pricing and images.
frontend/src/data/subscriptions.ts: Defines SubscriptionPlan and exports three fixed subscription plan configurations.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGateProvi: Implements an auth gate context that prompts login and runs deferred actions after authentication.
Clears user-related React Query caches including profile, orders, and subscriptions.
frontend/src/features/auth/useAuthGate.t: Provides access to the AuthGateContext and ensures usage within its provider.
Maintains cart state with add, remove, update, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartStorage.t: Loads and saves cart items to localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines CartItem and CartState interfaces used by the cart system.
frontend/src/features/cart/useCart.ts: Returns the cart context and enforces provider usage.
frontend/src/features/orders/orderMutati: Defines mutations for adding orders and subscriptions and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/orders/orderQuerie: Provides queries for order history and active subscriptions using the actor backend.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileQue: Implements profile fetch and update mutations, invalidating the profile cache on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes, including custom colors, shadows, and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappCheckout.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep-link URL containing formatted customer info, cart items, and total for checkout messaging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, features, and architectural notes for building the Fresh Bites 49 grocery storefront.
